name: untestable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An untestable theory cannot be proved by testing: Astrology remains an untestable belief system. The theory has already drawn criticism from other scientists, who claim that it is untestable.
not able to be tested: Researchers can now use partially degraded DNA recovered from previously untestable sources. Some of the children were deemed to be "untestable".
More examplesFewer examplesVagueness makes a hypothesis untestable, and therefore unscientific.These speculations often deal with essentially untestable propositions.The behaviourists criticized the role of untestable assumptions.
